title: Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail: Bookstore
body: Bookstore         Explore the Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail NPS Photo / Guell  Many books, guides, maps, pins, patches and medallions related to the Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail network are available at park and museum bookstores and some items are available through the Eastern National website or by calling 1-877-NAT-PARK.
